welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bethany, the charming city known for its scenic beauty and warm hospitality. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and experiencing all that this lovely city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Portland Airport, where all commercial flights are served.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Portland International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Portland International Airport serves domestic flights for Alaska Airlines, American Airlines, and Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Portland International Airport serves domestic flights for Frontier Airlines, JetBlue, and Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Portland International Airport serves domestic flights for United Airlines and Spirit Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D at Portland International Airport serves international flights and domestic flights for Hawaiian Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Troutdale Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Troutdale Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mal Airport serves domestic flights within Papua New Guinea.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Mal Airport handles all cargo operations for the airport.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.
